required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Similarity in Pharmacokinetics and Safety of IBI310 and Ipilimumab（YERVOY）in Adult Healthy Chinese Male Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Compare IBI310 and Ipilimumab on the Pharmacokinetics, Safety, Tolerance and Immunogenicity of a Single Dose In Healthy Male Subjects: a Randomized Double-blind Parallel Controlled Phase I Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: This trail will investigate the pharmacokinetics and safety of IBI310 and establish pharmacokinetics biosimilarity of IBI310 to ipilimumab （YERVOY）

secondary_outcome.measure: Positive rate of ADA and Nab
incidence and severity of adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from dosing to completion of study (183days posy-dosing) or to the patient withdrawl
secondary_outcome.description: Number of subjects with AE，treatment-related AE (TRAE), immune-related AEs (irAE), serious adverse SAE assessed by CTCAE V5.0

arm_group.description: Ipilimumab, 0.1 and 0.3mg/kg, will be administrated intravenously in 30-60 minutes.
IBI 310, 0.1 and 0.3mg/kg, will be administrated intravenously in 30-60 minutes.

intervention.description: Drug: Ipilimumab 0.1 mg/kg and 0.3 mg/kg in preparatory experiments and 0.3 mg/kg in formal experiment.
Drug: IBI310 0.1 mg/kg and 0.3 mg/kg in preparatory experiments and 0.3 mg/kg in formal experiment.

facility.name: Huashan Hospital Affiliated to Fudan University
